name: Dark Wartortle

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mirror Shell
attacks.text: If an attack does damage to Dark Wartortle during your opponent's next turn (even if Dark Wartortle is Knocked Out), Dark Wartortle attacks the Defending Pokémon for an equal amount of damage.

flavorText: A Pokémon with a negative attitude, it hides in its shell whenever it's in a bad mood—which is often.

strengths: Mirror Shell reflects damage back even if knocked out

competitiveHistory: Dark Wartortle was primarily an evolution step but Mirror Shell was interesting - even if knocked out, it would deal equal damage back. This could trade effectively against big attackers.

rulings.ruling: Mirror Shell reflects damage even if Dark Wartortle is knocked out by the attack.
Mirror Shell reflects the exact damage done to Dark Wartortle, after applying Weakness and Resistance to Dark Wartortle.
